title: strconv rounding error
body:
by **danielfleischman**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Compile and link this code:
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	var temp float64
	fmt.Scan(&temp)
	fmt.Printf("%.6f\n", temp)
}
2. Run with input 0.0000009

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected: 0.000001
Actual:   0.000000

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
d1ae873fca90 tip
